name: Kevin Levrone GOLD Blown Energizer,30 serv
description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD Blown Energizer,30 serv

Food supplement. With sweeteners. Contains caffeine (400 mg/serving size 9 g). Not recommended for children or pregnant women. The Full-Blown Energizer is a pre-workout product that contains a potent blend of active substances. Full Blown Energizer is recommended for physically active people, especially those who engage in high intensity and high volume strength training sessions.

Benefits

  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer is A pre-workout booster For Professional Athletes Who Train Intensively
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Increase Energy And Focus
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Improve Mental Alertness And Performance
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Contains Beta-Alanine, L-Citrulline Malate, Betaine Hydrochloride, Adenosine Triphosphate, Citicoline, L-Tyrosine

Ingredient

Beta-alanine, L-citrulline malate, betaine hydrochloride, adenosine triphosphate, citicoline, L-tyrosine, flavourings, acidity regulator (citric acid), anti-caking agents, caffeine, L-theanine, L-norvaline, niacin (nicotinamide), vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), colours, sweeteners (sucralose, acesulfame K). The measure included in the packet serves to facilitate portioning, but it does not guarantee precise dosing. It is advisable to use scales in order to measure out the exact amount.

Usage

Mix ~1 scoop of Full Blown Energizer (9 g) with 200-250 ml of cold water. Take 1 serving per day.

name: Muscletech Neurocore Pro Series - (Icy Blue Raspberry)
description:
Muscletech Neurocore Pro Series - (Icy Blue Raspberry)

Ultra-Potent, Super-Concentrated Pre-Workout Stimulant

NeuroCore® is the most explosive super-concentrated pre-workout stimulant available. Unlike the other guys, NeuroCore® features potent key ingredients in clinically studied amounts for maximum strength to deliver extreme energy, intense focus and superior workouts.

Beta-Alanine

A 3.2 g clinical dose of beta-alanine in 2 scoops to enhance the muscle- and strength-building process.

L-Citrulline 

Research-tested dose of pure L-citrulline for intense, long-lasting muscle pumps.

Creatine Hydrochloride (HCL)

Creatine HCI is a highly potent form of creatine. Creatine is clinically validated tom amplify gains in size and strength. This precise 3 g dose per 2 scoops won't cause bloating and requires no loading phase!

Rhodiola Extract

The 100 mg dose of the adaptogen, rhodiola extract, in 2 scoops of NeuroCore®, has been shown to improve mental and physical fitness during times of stress.

NeuroCore® L-Citrulline  Creatine Beta-Alanine Rhodiola
Per 2 Scoops 3 g 3 g Creatine HCl 3.2 g 100 mg
Leading Competitor 0 Undisclosed Amounts No Adaptogens
Benefits Superior Pumps Enhanced Muscle & Strength Adaptogenic Herb

Suggested Use

Shake container thoroughly before use. Consume 30 to 45 minutes before activity. We strongly recommend that you assess your tolerance first by using 1 scoop mixed with 6 oz. of water, especially if you are sensitive to stimulants. For full effects, mix 2 scoops with 12 oz. of water once your tolerance has been assessed. Do not exceed 2 scoops in a 24-hour period. Maintain an adequate state of hydration during use. Read the entire label before use and follow directions provided.

Pre - Use 30-45 Min. Pre-Workout

Other Ingredients

Silicon dioxide, natural and artificial flavors, citric acid, malic acid, acesulfame-potassium, sucralose, fd&c red no.40.Processed in a facility that processes milk, egg, wheat, soy, peanut, tree nuts, fish and shellfish ingredients.
short_description:
Muscletech Neurocore Pro Series – (Icy Blue Raspberry)

  • Research & Development
  • America’s #1 Selling Bodybuilding Supplement Brand♦

name: Insane Labz Psychotic Red (Pre-Workout, 35 Servings) Gummy Candy
description:
Insane Labz Psychotic Red (Pre-Workout) Gummy Candy

Psychotic is a stimulant-based supplement that is used 20 to 30 minutes before your workout. It’s loaded with several high-octane ingredients that have been shown to provide a number of fitness benefits including increased energy, greater strength output, and amped-up endurance. This unique formula has been shown to last for as long as three hours, making it ideal for any workout. Psychotic is also considered a nootropic supplement as it promotes cognitive performance and function. With ingredients such as Huperzine A, you’ll notice an immediate boost in your reaction time and overall alertness.

Benefits

Pre-workout supplements aren’t a luxury; they’re a requirement if you want to hit your peak levels of performance during each and every workout. When it comes to amping up your focus, performance, and results, the pre-workout, Psychotic is packed with the right combination of scientifically proven ingredients to ensure you go above and beyond.

Ingredients

Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavoring, Silica, Sucralose, Calcium Silicate

Insane Labz Psychotic Red (Pre-Workout) Gummy Candy

name: Insane Labz Psychotic Gold (Pre-Workout, 35 Servings)
description:
Insane Labz Psychotic Gold (Pre-Workout, 35 Servings)

Psychotic Gold is a complete pre-workout that offers similar energy as the original while adding vascularity boosters to flood your muscles with the oxygen they need to get more done.

  • ENERGY. FOCUS. PUMPS. What happens when you take the original pre-workout and add a full serving of citrulline and agmatine? You get GOLD, the biggest pump boosting pre-workout available. GOLD is formulated to give you the cleanest burst of energy and razor-sharp, long after your workout has ended.
  • Scientifically backed ingredients that include L-Citrulline, Beta-Alanine, and Agmatine Sulfate. When added to GOLD, these NO boosters allow for vein boosting vascularity like no other supplement on the market.
  • The unique combination of NO boosters and focus enhancers make GOLD one of the most sought after pre-workouts on the market. To top it off, Insane Labz added their patented ingredients OXYgold and AMPiberry to better absorb all the ingredients for maximum results.

Psychotic GOLD is formulated for those hardcore stimulant junkies that want to push their workouts to the next level.  Loaded with clinical dosages of the industry's top ingredients like Citrulline and Agmatine Sulfate for increased vascularity, Beta-Alanine for muscle endurance, and DMAE bitartrate for insane focus.  Psychotic GOLD is the pinnacle of high stimulant pre-workouts.

name: Cellucor C4 Original (30 & 60 servings)
description:
Cellucor C4 Original (30 & 60 servings)

Pre-Workout Energy

C4 Sport, taken 30 minutes prior to exercise, provides a boost of energy and focus to maximize your workout.

NSF - Certified for Sport

The NSF Certified for Sport Program helps athletes, coaches and trainers make more informed decisions when choosing supplements. The program is recognized by the NFL, NFL Players Association, MLB, MLB Players Association, PGA, LPGA, and Canadian Centre for Ethics in Sports.

The NSF certification mark on our products helps athletes of all levels buy our supplements with confidence. Certified supplements must meet rigorous standards that include comprehensive lab testing and extensive evaluation of the manufacturing process to ensure contaminated substances or hidden ingredients are not added to a product.

‡ Based on sales of C4 brand products in the U.S.A. from 2014 to present.

Suggested Use

Take one serving (1 scoop) of C4 Sport, mixed with 6-8 fl. oz. of water 20-30 minutes before training. During your workout, it is recommended that your drink plenty of water.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, malic acid, natural and artificial flavors, calcium silicate, silicon dioxide, sucralose, polydextrose, acesulfame potassium
short_description:
Cellucor C4 Original (30 & 60 servings)

  • 1. 6g carnosyn beta- alanine
  • 1G creatine nitrate (no3-t )
  • 150mg caffeine

name: Betancourt Nutrition B-nox Androrush - 35 Servings
description:
Betancourt Nutrition B-NOX Androrush, 35 Servings

✔ Superior Energy - Scientifically formulated to target quick energy and intensity to one’s exercise routine. Providing 200 mg of Caffeine, Theobromine and Beet Root Powder to support energy levels and peak performance.

✔ Strength + Endurance - Glucose Polymers (Maltodextrin), L-Taurine, Beta-alanine (as CarnoSyn®), Dicreatine Malate, and Glucuronolactone to supply sustained strength and energy for your entire workout. Our Strength and Endurance blend was strategically formulated to help ensure the effects of B-NOX® last your entire exercise routine.

✔ Key Amino Acids - Utilizing key amino acids, such as L-Glutamine, L-Leucine, N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine, and more to support protein synthesis, utilization and faster recovery. Glutamine is a key amino acid that supports various functions in the body. Research has shown that L-Glutamine helps decrease muscle soreness and improve overall recovery after exercise. L-Leucine is a vital essential amino acid used for protein synthesis in the body. Studies have shown that L-Leucine helps to assist in maintaining lean muscle mass and supporting overall metabolism. N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine, which is the acetylated form of L-Tyrosine, is a natural amino acid that increases overall cognitive function. By using a highly bioavailable form of L-Tyrosine for fast absorption, N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine helps support the synthesis of dopamine, epinephrine, norepinephrine

name: MusclePharm Assault, 30 Servings
description:
MusclePharm Assault, 30 Servings

Powerful Pre-workout Formula with CarnoSyn Beta-Alanine
With each serving of 14.5g, you get 2g of CarnoSyn beta-alanine which delays muscle fatigue, boosting your performance during high intensity exercises.

Features ION-3 Patented Nitrate Technology
The ION-3 nitrate technology includes creatine, arginine and BCAA nitrates that work together to enhance your blood flow, promoting nutrient delivery to your muscles. You intensify your athletic performance with an improved strength, recover quickly from muscle soreness and gain muscle mass much faster.

Infused with Anabolism Enhancing Nutrients
With ingredients like glycine, D-ribose, dextrose and cinnulin PF, your muscles stay in an anabolic mode, reducing the intensity of muscle breakdown after a heavy workout. Your body gets loaded with energy and you indulge in longer and harder workouts to gain muscle strength and lean mass in a lesser time.
